Number Participants 50 participant Main Inclusion Criteria - Patient age > 18 year - Histologically diagnosed Prostate cancer , stag T1b-T3bN0M0 - Any Gleason score - Any PSA level - Patient able consent fill questionnaires Exclusion Criteria - Previous TURP/HoLEP Laser Prostatectomy - Any Metastatic Disease - IPSS > 20 - Pubic arch interference - Lithotomy position anaesthesia possible - Rectal fistula - Prior pelvic radiotherapy Statistical Methodology Analysis Percentages adverse event compare use Fisher 's Exact Test . Toxicity score mean compare use two-sample permutation t-tests , PSA relapse-free survival estimate use Kaplan-Meier compare use log-rank test .

DOC.detailed_description: The role radiotherapy management prostate cancer significantly change last decade development Brachytherapy , External Beam Radiotherapy ( EBRT ) , Intensity modulate Radiotherapy ( IMRT ) Image guide Radiotherapy ( IGRT ) . One challenge factor Radiotherapy treatment localise prostate cancer acute late Genitourinary Gastrointestinal toxicity . There several study case series publish literature assess toxicity develop EBRT Brachytherapy treatment prostate cancer EBRT Brachytherapy emerge main stay localised prostate cancer treatment recent year . The low risk localise prostate cancer treat low dose brachytherapy prostatectomy , whereas intermediate high risk localise prostate cancer usually treat EBRT alone along HDR brachytherapy . The recent European guideline suggest consensus regard time HDR brachytherapy EBRT . The schedule vary different institution HDR boost give either EBRT . Few centre deliver HDR in-between fraction EBRT . The EBRT dose range 37.5Gy 15 fraction 45Gy 25 fraction give HDR . The total HDR brachytherapy dose deliver fraction , however single dose 15Gy gain acceptance across world due logistical advantage . The Time gap two Radiotherapy mode delivery generally within 21 day . There consensus timing HDR brachytherapy ( BT ) treat along EBRT . The advantage use HDR Brachytherapy EBRT investigator could potentially identify patient suitable brachytherapy early treatment process . It essential know whether significant difference toxicity treatment outcome especially acute urinary toxicity amongst two treatment approach . It do simple 1:1 ratio randomisation possible participant meet inclusion exclusion criterion . Brachytherapy procedure Procedure carry surgical theatre Southend University Hospital . 1 . The Dose Volume Histogram ( DVH ) would accord local radiotherapy protocol . The gap BT EBRT irrespective sequence exceed 3 week . Therefore total Radiotherapy treatment time seven half week Patients receive neo-adjuvant adjuvant anti androgen therapy 6 month 3 year accord risk stratification disease per standard care All statistical significance test 5 % significance level . For IPSS IIEFS scale score , two mean follow-up assessment compare use two-sided permutation t-test use 1000000 random permutation , 95 % confidence limit difference mean calculate use bootstrap use 9999 re-samplings . For secondary analysis Prostate-specific antigen relapse-free survival use Kaplan-Meier method , test difference survival curve use log-rank test P-value obtain use permutation test 10000 permutation .
